      maybe

4.8.22  1:55 pm   Just wanted to pass on my appreciation for your art. True artistry, insane musicianship, etc. You've brightened my life and many others. THANK YOU

      holy smokes, you are very friendly

4.8.22  1:28 pm   are you a human

      oh that would explain all these seemingly outlandish feelings

4.8.22  1:26 pm   Do you have any unused verses/ choruses from your songs;

     sure

      if so what are they

     here i found one:
      at the airport terminal the planes are landing
      doing their job and paying their bills
      i'm writing stories of love and understanding
      it doesn't matter but soon it will

      regular

4.8.22  12:05 pm   how to take a break from internet?

      you could go to neptune

4.8.22  10:17 am   how the fuck do you even

      impossible. it can't be done

4.8.22  10:02 am   how do you make your choruses so damn good

      that's easy. just find the best part in the song and then call that the chorus

4.8.22  7:31 am   You released one song in february, two songs in march, will you release three songs in april?

     no

     if not, how many?

     1

4.8.22  2:36 am   What is your opinion on facts?

      so true

4.8.22  1:54 am   could you see yourself doing a cover in the near future

      yes

4.8.22  12:27 am   how do you know what chord to play after another so that it fits on the song you're playing? (talkin about chord progression)

      it's the same as knowing what words you say after each previous word, in the sentence you are saying. i actually don't know.... how do we do that? surely you didn't spend time thinking about each word...... there's this part of our brain that does this stuff. i think it might be the Language department

4.7.22  9:21 pm   what are your opinions on the word rambunctious 

      synonym of rowdy

4.7.22  8:46 pm   what's your favorite side of a sphere

      it's a tie between the outside and the inside

4.7.22  6:19 pm   does "I wonder if you wonder what number we're counting to, whatever number makes the whole thing true" mean "am I the only one who wants to know how long we're going to wait? we're waiting for an opportunity to take action at a time that makes our story make 'sense' and justifies all our past mistakes, but it might never come"?

     among other things, yes

     does "I wonder if you're wondering how it got this far" mean "just look at what we've become and how far we've fallen because we became complacent and set in our ways"?

     among other things, yes

     does "9, 8, nothing, where will you go? when will you leave and how will you know? think of a new number and then count up to it real slow" mean "when the countdown runs out and it's finally time to rip off the band-aid and do what we should have done a long time ago, you're just going to want to delay even further by some completely made up amount of time"?

      no

4.7.22  5:55 pm   Are helicopters just flying cars?

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

4.7.22  5:13 pm   have you ever swung from a chandelier?

     no

      do you have plans to do this in the future?

      no

4.7.22  4:51 pm   what does "meef" mean?

      milk beef?

4.7.22  2:43 pm   someone probably has asked this before, but when you come up with stuff, where is some of the first parts of the songs you develop them? The melodies, bass lines, chords, etc. And how long does it take you to flesh out majority of a song?

      i have no idea what 'fleshing' means, but 99% of the time the song is written in order of time, in the song. so the beginning is written first, then the next part, then the next, etc all the way to the end. I can usually get through the writing of a song in about 1 to 3 days. it's unpredictable because mechanism revolves around imagining new things out of nowhere. there's unfortunately no guaranteed service counter you can go and pick up the next part. you kind of have to just sit around and pray. and the more you can trick yourself into not trying, the better it will go. the most valuable thing you can do to coax the next part into existence is do a clean run through from the beginning, after not hearing it for a while

4.7.22  2:33 pm   When people use the subjunctive mood, are they actually coming up with alternate history scenarios?

      alternate present

4.7.22  1:40 pm   Would you consider your music a part of the gospel genre?

      sometimes

4.7.22  1:22 pm   are you making lore

      no but i will at some point

4.7.22  10:45 am   I am everywhere and nowhere, so where am I?

      here

4.7.22  10:40 am   What is your professional opinion on potatoes?

      a good simple point of reference

4.7.22  3:29 am   If I want to be able to play songs by ear, should I be trying to hear the intervals between notes or what scale degree each note is in the key? Or am I supposed to be able to hear both at the same time?

      you're gonna be able to hear both, and more

4.7.22  12:57 am   are jokes and humor funny?

      no

      how about a chicken, crossing the road, for apparently no reason whatsoever

4.6.22  4:19 pm   do you tell the truth in your songs

      it's gotta be in there somewhere

4.6.22  4:15 pm   I have my heart set on this dream. At the best of times I find it hard to believe in myself, but from a realistic perspective I do have a chance, and I'm going to give it my all. I'm basically holding myself to doing this thing, and I can't imagine a life where I don't do it. Should I continue on this path, or am I thinking unrealistically?

      you've already decided, which is good news because i cannot weigh in on this because i think you forgot to tell me what the goal is, or any details about the situation at all

4.6.22  4:07 pm   opinion on cashews 

      sometimes you gotta do a little math to find out how much of the cashew you actually halve

      they are a close cousin of other birds

4.6.22  3:18 pm   how many songs have you scrapped because you didn't like them

      i have never scrapped a song. i actually don't know what that means

      never heard of it

4.6.22  11:11 am   is fly around about escaping the worries and troubles from i'm scared?

      probably not

4.6.22  7:14 am   what is the first memory of music you have?

      pressing C and E, but not D. then pressing D and F and not E. while listening to these chords and pondering their emotional effects, i also noticed that the sides of the piano keys are not white, they're wood colored, and only have a white layer on the top

4.6.22  6:33 am   Why are birds equipped with legs if they can fly

      so they can also walk

4.6.22  5:48 am   why u exist?

      to experiment with time and space

4.6.22  5:17 am   have you ever used 7/4 before

      yes

4.6.22  1:35 am   what keys is 9 8 7 in?

      D dorian, F, D dorian, F, Bb dorian, Gb, D dorian, F, D dorian

4.6.22  1:21 am   Why did you never make a video to go with "got to know what's going on"? It's a super awesome song!

      the reason i skipped the videos for those 4 songs (june 2017) was to allow me to release the songs quicker. if i had made a video for it, all my other videos since then would have come out later than they actually did

      it all depends on what other words are surrounding it

      maybe
